creditline: Given by the children of Judson and Barbara White Bemis in memory of Edwin and Anne T. White

description: two panels sewn onto blue waistband; red silk panels embroidered with bird, flowers and fish; pink backing

at one side below waistband on lining, in black ink: [517/(Chinese character)/(2 Chinese characters)]

title: Skirt, from a two-piece wedding costume
